promotion_constructionType_texts.promocion-rehabilitacion-text: Projects focused on the renovation or improvement of existing buildings for the sale or rental of refurbished units.
promotion_constructionType_texts.promocion-protegida-text: Housing projects subject to specific regulations, such as social housing or affordable housing.
promotion_constructionType_texts.complejo-turistico-text: Projects oriented towards the sale or rental of homes with a tourist focus and specific services for short stays.
promotion_constructionType_texts.edificio-multifamiliar-text: Projects consisting of the construction of a building with multiple residential units, commercial spaces, coworking areas, and shared amenities.
promotion_constructionType_texts.promocion-villas-individuales-text: Projects involving the construction or commercialization of single-family homes designed as independent villas.
promotion_constructionType_texts.promocion-conjunto-villas: Clustered Villas, Townhouses, or Semi-Detached Promotion
promotion_constructionType_texts.promocion-conjunto-villas-text: Projects that include a small number of villas (e.g., between 2 and 99) within the same development.
promotion_constructionType_texts.promocion-residencial-mixta-text: Projects that combine different types of housing, such as villas and apartments, within the same development, sharing common areas.
